text:
Frontend Engineer | ExecVision | Arlington, VA | Full-Time | Remote OK

ExecVision is building conversation analytics to help sales focused organizations close more deals and improve their reps' efficacy.

We are looking for talented Frontend Engineers to join our product team. Primarily this means fluency with React, and the ability & desire to create great user interfaces. Experience with D3 would be beneficial, and of course full stack engineers (who work with, or want to learn, Python, Kotlin and/or Java) are welcome to apply also.

Email your resume to careers@execvision.io
